messages.message:
Some suggestions on the search UI:
1. Wrap the text in the search box to a second line. 
2. The research button should be below next to drive
3. No need for the X at the end
4. No need need to show my query again at the bottom
On the query performance:
1. The Docs chatbot gave the right answer
2. In Search, with all drives selected it gave the wrong answer
3. With just Docs drive, it only gave answer with just the Advanced model
4. There is a line of latex formatted content that needs to be rendered correctly.

thanks for the feedback!

Tracking the UI improvements as part of this ticket https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4081.

On query performance, we are aware of this issue. It is related to selecting the right chunks. We are migrating to a larger embedding model and that should address this.

For more details, you can refer to below documents

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vW519t9E4C68KKTQuv2tFBSGl4fz-14_mRp1mLBTJi4/edit?usp=sharing

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZCKyKUAdYaplMtYC0DgX23N0xjNLToStAuwXI8NdFS8/edit?usp=sharing
